name: The Maze (XandaGames)
description:
Hello,

This is my first game try with Unreal.  I've been studying it for a few months and wanted to participate in the Jam, possibly for laughs.  I am continuing to passionately pursue new knowledge tutorials  of the game engine and so that I may  to add cooler and more efficient  functionality.

It is meant for the Xbox 360 or Xbox One controller.

Game Pad Inputs:

Left Thumbstick = Forward and Backwards

Right thumbstick= Look around up and down

Left thumbstick button down= Equip with weapon

Right Thumbstick button down once = Call "Little Geek" little geek will go to the direction of the end of the maze.(experimental stage)

Right thumbstick pressed again resets little geek.

A= jump

B= pickup

Right shoulder= Crouch

Left shoulder= Aim weapon

Left trigger= Run

Right trigger=Shoot

you have to aim in order to shoot

destroy the spider for ammo pickups you'll need the ammo
